pp1.3:9.1: Arukūpamacitto puggalo, vijjūpamacitto puggalo, vajirūpamacitto puggalo. #5
pp1.3:11.1: Avakujjapañño puggalo, ucchaṅgapañño puggalo, puthupañño puggalo. #7
pp1.3:12.1: Atthekacco puggalo kāmesu ca bhavesu ca avītarāgo, atthekacco puggalo kāmesu vītarāgo bhavesu avītarāgo, atthekacco puggalo kāmesu ca bhavesu ca vītarāgo. #8
pp1.3:13.1: Pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo, pathavilekhūpamo puggalo, udakalekhūpamo puggalo. #9
pp1.3:17.1: Atthekacco puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo. #13
pp1.3:18.1: Atthekacco puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo;
pp1.3:19.1: Atthekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī, samādhismiṃ mattaso kārī, paññāya mattaso kārī;
pp1.3:19.2: atthekacco puggalo sīlesu ca paripūrakārī, samādhismiñca paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī;
pp1.3:19.3: atthekacco puggalo sīlesu ca paripūrakārī, samādhismiñca paripūrakārī, paññāya ca paripūrakārī. #15
